text: Gregory Walcott (January 13, 1928 - March 20, 2015), born Bernard Wasdon Mattox in Wendell, North Carolina, was an American movie and television actor. He played Jeff Trent in Ed Wood's 1959 science fiction classic, Plan 9 from Outer Space. Walcott died of natural causes at his home in Los Angeles, California, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1928 births Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:2015 deaths
title: Gregory Walcott
